channel.title: Would it be possible to
channel.description:
hello, i was just thinking about some things i could add to my server and i thought would it be possible to like make something so i could spy on a person like say E.G. if i did... ::spy [playername] and the camera locked on them
is this possible to make coz if it is ill try and make =]
(its kinda like the things in the fight pits (u can view with them))

item.title: Would it be possible to
item.dc:creator: @taylor08 taylor08
item.description:
@taylor08 wrote:

ahh lol thanks for all your posts ill just wait for now =P or try and find out how ill do some tests and release it if i make it.

Read full topic

item.title: Would it be possible to
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Would be done client sided, as the camera angles focussing on your character are done within it.
